page.title: 06SCHOOL FETE HIGH ERCALL
page.content: Our School Fete started with a fancy dress parade. The first prize went to a boy who was dressed as a skeleton. There were about six main selling stalls. There were Toys Books, Plants, Biscuits, Handicrafts, Cakes, Sweets and Tombola stalls. Games included Guess the Weight of the Guinea Pig, Name the Mouse and a lot more. There was a Grand draw with nine prizes to win. The first prize was a Patio Set. There were some attractions. One was a Vintage Tractor which gave rides around the field. Radio controlled cars whizzed around the carpark. R.A.F Shawbury sent a red and grey fire engine and it was good. Model boats came and they were very detailed and accurate models which were made by a man from Shrewsbury. By Christopher Harris.
